locations.name: Paro
locations.description: A valley town renowned for the iconic Taktsang Monastery (Tiger's Nest) and the impressive Paro Rinpung Dzong, serving as a major arrival point and cultural hub.

locations.name: Thimphu
locations.description: The unique capital city of Bhutan, blending tradition and modernity, known for landmarks like the Buddha Dordenma statue and the National Memorial Chorten.
